data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 408 believers in Amanat Al Asimah.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Amanat Al Asimah, Yemen
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Amanat Al Asimah, Yemen into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Amanat Al Asimah, Yemen. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, guide the 408 believers in the state of Amanat Al Asimah into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Deaf people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Amanat Al Asimah, Yemen.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Amanat Al Asimah, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Amanat Al Asimah.
